        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.

img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game where a player character, seen from a third-person perspective, is facing off against a large, aggressive creature in a rocky, overgrown environment. The creature has a health bar above its head, indicating it is an enemy. The user interface displays various icons and status bars, including health and stamina bars at the bottom left, and ability icons on the bottom right. The setting appears to be a cave or a similar natural area with dim lighting and rugged terrain.
